a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}{d}UTU-EN-PAB lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia DI-mu a-na {URU}de-ri DI-mu a-na {URU}HAL.ṢU {LU₂}A-KIN-e-a {LU₂}A-KIN-e-a ša a-na x x x aš₂-pur-u-ni it-tal-ka iq-ṭi-bi-a ma-a {1}{d}PA-GAL₂-ši x x x x TA {URU}hi-da-li x x x x x ma-a 06 mar-de-e-ti x x x ma-a ina ŠA₃-bi x x x x ma-a {LU₂}e-mu-qi x x x x ina {URU}bu-bi-lu x x x x ma-a LUGAL {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} x x x ina {URU}E₂-bu-nak-ki šu-u₂ u₃ ma-a {LU₂}x x x x x il-la-ka x x x x x x x x ru x+x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x x ša {1}{d}MAŠ-x x x x a-na LUGAL x x x x a-šap-x x x x x
